summary: WHILE PARKED AND THE KEY OUT OF THE IGNITION,  THE VEHICLE CAME OUT OF GEAR AND ROLLED DOWN THE DRIVEWAY COLLIDING INTO A TREE. THEN SIX WEEKS LATER A RECALL ISSUED FOR THE FLOOR SHIFT ASSEMBLY. THE CONSUMER HAS CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURER FOR REIMBURSEMENT, HOWEVER THEY HAVE DENIED HER CLAIM. PLEASE PROVIDE ADDITIONAL INFORMATION. *JB
